modelDescription: Mention contains details about text recognized as a user mention.

modelFields.description: Start is the start position (zero-based) of the recognized user mention within the Tweet. All start indices are inclusive.
End is the end position (zero-based) of the recognized user mention within the Tweet. This end index is exclusive.
Username is the part of text recognized as a user mention. You can obtain the expanded object in includes.users by adding expansions=entities.mentions.username in the request's query parameter.
